title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Adaptive Learning Activity Sequencing

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-Optimized Course for Developing Social Studies Pedagogical Expertise Among Pre-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply five adaptive sequencing strategies according to situational contexts.
Learners can design activity sequences based on learner data in mobile environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete a three-stage activity linkage structure through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
